key_mistakes.reason: This move does not challenge the center and allows White to gain a slight advantage.
Developing the bishop here allows White to gain tempo with pawn advances.
This move allows Black to gain a significant advantage.

recommendations: Focus on controlling the center early in the game to establish a strong position.
Strengthen your pawn structure to avoid weaknesses that can be exploited.
Be mindful of piece activity and look for opportunities to improve the positioning of your pieces.
